string.text: You interested in trading any weapons?

Are you crazy? The military already harass me enough as it is. Besides, what are the rookies around here gonna do if I sell them some fancy shooter? Just go and get themselves killed by the Monolith. Go find someone else.
Nevermind then. Forget I asked.
You interested in trading any weapons?
I can buy some cheap NATO weapons from you but I can't sell you anything. We're recording everything in here after all.
Okay.
You interested in trading any weapons?
I can buy high end NATO weapons from you but I can't sell you anything. We're recording everything in here after all.
Okay.
You interested in trading any weapons?
Yes, but don't bother bringing me anything fancy. I need cheap, reliable Russian firearms. The stalkers around here can't afford anything better. Make sure they're fixed up.
Okay.
You interested in trading any weapons?
Yes. I'm always looking for some decent Russian-made weapons. Nothing too crazy, but don't bring in any of that rookie shit either. And they better be in good condition!
Sounds good.
You interested in trading any weapons?
Yes, I need the finest firearms the Motherland has to offer. Guys around here need all the firepower they can get. And they've got to be pristine! A jam out here will get you killed in a second.
Perfect.
You interested in trading any weapons?
Yes, I need the most inexpensive NATO weapons. The stalkers around here can't afford anything better. And they better be in good condition!
Okay.
You interested in trading any weapons?
Yes, I'm always looking for some decent NATO guns. Affordable but powerful, got it? They've got to be in working order.
Sounds good.
You interested in trading any weapons?
Yes, I need top-of-line NATO weapons. In these parts you can never be too careful. And they need to be in great condition.
Perfect.
You interested in trading any weapons?
Yeah, I need whatever I can get, as long as it's cheap. Guys who come around here can't afford anything fancy. Just make sure they're fixed up, I'm not buying your scrap.
Okay.
You interested in trading any weapons?
Yeah, I always need some decent firearms, not too cheap and not too pricey. As long as they're in working order I can sell them.
Sounds good.
You interested in trading any weapons?
Yeah, I need the best weapons you can find - Russian, NATO, whatever. If it's expensive and goes boom, I want it.
Perfect.
